com.emarsys.predict

Class RecommendationRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emarsys.predict.RecommendationRequest

  • public class RecommendationRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    The recommendation request. RecommendationRequests are not reusable.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • RecommendationRequest

        public RecommendationRequest(java.lang.String logic)
        Creates a RecommendationRequest.
        Parameters:
        logic - the recommendation strategy to be used. Eg. recommend similar products (RELATED), or show personal recommendations (PERSONAL), etc.

    • Method Detail

      • getLogic

        public java.lang.String getLogic()
        Returns the recommendation logic.
        Returns:
        logic

      • getLimit

        public int getLimit()
        Returns the number of items to recommend. Default: 5.
        Returns:
        number of items to recommend

      • setLimit

        public void setLimit(int limit)
        Sets the number of items to recommend.
        Parameters:
        limit - number of items to recommend

      • getBaseline

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getBaseline()
        Returns the item IDs of the original recommendations. Only used when an A/B test is in progress to compare the performance of the EmarsysPredictSDK recommendations vs. the original (baseline) recommendations.
        Returns:
        baseline

      • setBaseline

        public void setBaseline(java.util.List<java.lang.String> baseline)
        Set the baseline of the original recommendations. Only used when an A/B test is in progress to compare the performance of the EmarsysPredictSDK recommendations vs. the original (baseline) recommendations.
        Parameters:
        baseline - item IDs of the original recommendations

        value - value to compare against
